info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 18 at 2:59PM MST until November 18 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
SVRFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Yavapai County in west central Arizona...
* Until 345 PM MST.
* At 259 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Page Springs, or near Sedona, moving northeast at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected.
* Locations impacted include... Sedona, Slide Rock State Park, Sedona Airport, East Pocket Lookout Tower, Edge of the World, Cathedral Rock, Schnebly Hill Overlook, Palatki Heritage Site, Pine Flats, Bell Rock, Secret Mountain Vista, Fernow Cabin, Munds Mountain Wilderness, Village of Oak Creek, Oak Creek Vista Overlook, Honanki Heritage Site, Munds Park, Page Springs, Cornville and Uptown Sedona.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 318 and 329. State Route 179 between mile markers 303 and 313. State Route 89A between mile markers 361 and 391.
This includes the following recreation areas and campgrounds... Manzanita Campground, Pine Flat Campground, Cave Springs Campground and Pine Flat Campground.
This includes the following swimming holes... Pumphouse Wash, Slide Rock, Encinoso, Grasshopper Point, Midgely Bridge, Buddha Beach "Red Rock Crossing" and Crescent Moon Ranch.
info.instruction:
Seek shelter inside a well-built structure and stay away from windows. This storm is capable of producing large hail.
Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Seek shelter immediately in an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built structure.
